effect.shortEffect: Raises Speed one stage upon being hit by a dark, ghost, or bug move.
effect.full: This Pokémon's Speed rises one stage with each hit from a damaging dark-, ghost-, or bug-type move.

description.black-white: Some move types scare it and boost its Speed.
